name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary: A dedicated Software Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, specializing in delivering high-performance web applications using **React**, **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**. Proven expertise in optimizing UI/UX for enhanced user engagement and satisfaction. Demonstrated capability in testing libraries to ensure robust application performance and reliability. Strong background in cross-team collaboration and mentoring, fostering knowledge sharing and skill enhancement among peers. I excel in performance profiling and optimization techniques, ensuring applications run efficiently in production. My programming knowledge extends to **Ruby** and **Go**, allowing for versatile project contributions. My history includes building secure and compliant solutions in healthcare and finance, leveraging cloud services such as **Azure** and **AWS**, and integrating AI/ML capabilities for advanced analytics. Passionate about public speaking and writing to share insights and strategies within the tech community.
